anns.prefix: The GPA-resistance mechanism in
anns.postfix: —the producer of the last-resort-drug teicoplanin—has been intensively studied in recent years, posing relevant questions about the role of Tei3 sensor histidine kinase.

anns.prefix: The setup of a GPA-responsive assay system in the model
anns.postfix: coelicolor allowed us to demonstrate that Tei3 functions as a non-inducible kinase, conferring high levels of GPA resistance in A. teichomyceticus.

anns.prefix: Coupling these experimental results with a further in silico analysis, a novel scenario on GPA-resistance and biosynthetic genes co-evolution in
anns.postfix: was hereby proposed.
